sentences.english: To be respectful of one another and the relationship, you should try and keep the discussion (or argument) focused to the topic at hand.
sentences.chinese: 出于对双方和彼此关系的尊重，你应该争取就事论事。

sentences.english: The cops were matter-of-fact about the whole thing.
sentences.chinese: 两个警察对整个事件抱着就事论事的态度。

sentences.english: As a matter of fact, a successful person is capable of setting goals and paving the way against all odds.
sentences.chinese: 就事论事，成功者懂得立定目标，又能排除万难铺路。

sentences.english: Try to look at the experience objectively.
sentences.chinese: 就事论事地看待这次经验。

sentences.english: But perhaps they are teaching us to separate the deed from the person.
sentences.chinese: 不过可能他们在教我们就事论事吧。

sentences.english: Management deals in facts and figures, an analytical approach to a problem.
sentences.chinese: 管理侧重于确定性的事实和就事论事的分析。

sentences.english: Leaders can also set aside matters of personality and make decisions based on fact.
sentences.chinese: 领导者也会排出个人成见，就事论事。

sentences.english: Just call it for what it is.
An editorial writer should maintain a hard-eyed attitude.
sentences.chinese: 社论作者应保持就事论事的态度。

sentences.english: "I have cerebral palsy, " he answered matter-of-factly.
sentences.chinese: “我患有大脑性麻痹，”他就事论事地回答说。

sentences.english: Instead, a thing should be considered on its own terms;
sentences.chinese: 但恰恰相反，我们应该就事论事地考虑一件事情。

sentences.english: Instead, a thing should be considered on its own terms; we should avoid the tendency to compare it to something else.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该就事论事，避免把它拿去和其他事物比较。
